## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G45140](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G45140)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATLOX2, LOX2</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIODOPSIS THALIANA LIPOXYGENASE 2, lipoxygenase 2
- **Description:**   lipoxygenase 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [lox2-1 / lox2-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Both the intact and partially wounded lox2-1 mutant did not emit detectable amounts of GLVs and C5 volatiles.
